verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Rescue the perishing,
Care for the dying;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Jesus is merciful,
Jesus will save.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Rescue the perishing,
Care for the dying,
Snatch them in pity from sin
and the grave;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Weep o'er the erring one,
Lift up the fallen,
Tell them of Jesus
the mighty to save.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Tho' they are slighting Him,
Still He is waiting,
Waiting the penitent child
to receive;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Plead with them earnestly,
Plead with them gently,
He will forgive
if they only believe.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Down in the human heart,
Crushed by the tempter,
Feelings lie buried
that grace can restore;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Touched by a loving heart,
Wakened by kindness,
Chords that are broken
will vibrate once more.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Back to the narrow way
patiently win them;
Tell the poor wanderer
a Savior has died.
